titles.title: John F. Kennedy Center Reauthorization Act of 2016
John F. Kennedy Center Reauthorization Act of 2016
John F. Kennedy Center Reauthorization Act of 2016
A bill to amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize appropriations for the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.
John F. Kennedy Center Reauthorization Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe without amendment. With written report No. 114-254.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 465.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the Senate reported version is repeated here.)
John F. Kennedy Center Reauthorization Act of 2016
(Sec. 2) This bill amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to reauthorize appropriations for FY2017-FY2020 for maintenance, repair, and security, and capital projects for the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.
